languages.text: {n}Два блюстителя с разбитыми лицами конвоируют Инфернус-мастера Энриха Монтэга. Губа Инфернус-мастера разбита, костяшки ободраны, в зубах — перекушенная папироса.{/n}

{n}A pair of enforcers with battered faces is escorting Infernus Master Einrich Monteg. His lip is busted, his knuckles are grazed and covered with blood, and there is a chewed-up lho-stick between his teeth.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Два блюстителя с разбитыми лицами конвоируют Инфернус-мастера Энриха Монтэга. Губа Инфернус-мастера разбита, костяшки ободраны, в зубах — перекушенная папироса.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}A pair of enforcers with battered faces are escorting Infernus Master Einrich Monteg. The Infernus Master's lip is busted, his knuckles are scraped and covered with blood, and there is a chewed lho stick between his teeth.{/n}

{n}A pair of enforcers with battered faces is escorting Infernus Master Einrich Monteg. His lip is busted, his knuckles are grazed and covered with blood, and there is a chewed-up lho-stick between his teeth.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Zwei Enforcer mit verschwollenen Gesichtern eskortieren Infernus-Meister Einrich Monteg. Seine Lippe ist aufgeplatzt, seine Knöchel sind blutverschmiert und zwischen seinen Zähnen steckt ein angekauter Lho-Stab.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A pair of enforcers with battered faces is escorting Infernus Master Einrich Monteg. His lip is busted, his knuckles are grazed and covered with blood, and there is a chewed-up lho-stick between his teeth.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Zwei Enforcer mit verschwollenen Gesichtern eskortieren Infernus-Meister Einrich Monteg. Seine Lippe ist aufgeplatzt, seine Knöchel sind blutverschmiert und zwischen seinen Zähnen steckt ein angekauter lho-Stab.

languages.text: {n}Deux prévôts aux visages burinés escortent le maître-infernus Einrich Monteg. Sa lèvre est fendue, ses jointures sont écorchées et couvertes de sang, et il serre entre ses dents un cigalho à moitié mâché.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A pair of enforcers with battered faces is escorting Infernus Master Einrich Monteg. His lip is busted, his knuckles are grazed and covered with blood, and there is a chewed-up lho-stick between his teeth.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Deux prévôts aux visages burinés escortent le maître-infernus Einrich Monteg. Sa lèvre est fendue, ses jointures sont écorchées et couvertes de sang, et il serre entre ses dents un cigalho à moitié mâché.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Una pareja de guardias con los rostros magullados escoltan al maestro de infernus Einrich Monteg. Tiene el labio partido, los nudillos desollados y cubiertos de sangre, y aprieta entre los dientes un cigarrillo de lho medio masticado.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A pair of enforcers with battered faces is escorting Infernus Master Einrich Monteg. His lip is busted, his knuckles are grazed and covered with blood, and there is a chewed-up lho-stick between his teeth.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Una pareja de guardias con los rostros magullados escoltan al maestro de infernus Einrich Monteg. Tiene el labio partido, los nudillos desollados y cubiertos de sangre, y aprieta entre los dientes un cigarrillo de lho medio masticado.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ボコボコになった顔のエンフォーサーが、インフェルヌス・マスター・アインリッヒ・モンテグを連行している。アインリッヒの唇は裂け、拳はかすり傷と血に塗れており、その歯の間には噛み砕かれたルホスティックが挟まっている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A pair of enforcers with battered faces is escorting Infernus Master Einrich Monteg. His lip is busted, his knuckles are grazed and covered with blood, and there is a chewed-up lho-stick between his teeth.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ボコボコになった顔のエンフォーサーが、インフェルヌス・マスター・アインリッヒ・モンテグを連行している。アインリッヒの唇は裂け、拳はかすり傷と血に塗れており、その歯の間には噛み砕かれたアイホスティックが挟まっている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}两个脸上伤痕累累的执法者正在押送控火大师艾因里奇·蒙特格。艾因里奇的嘴唇被打破了，指关节沾满了血，齿间咬着一根被嚼过的麻烟。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A pair of enforcers with battered faces is escorting Infernus Master Einrich Monteg. His lip is busted, his knuckles are grazed and covered with blood, and there is a chewed-up lho-stick between his teeth.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}两个脸上伤痕累累的执法者正在押送控火大师艾因里奇·蒙特格。艾因里奇的嘴唇被打破了，指关节沾满了血，齿间咬着一根被嚼过的麻烟。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yüzlerinde kavga izleri taşıyan bir grup infazcı, İtfa Üstadı Einrich Monteg'e eşlik ediyor. Einrich'in dudağı yarılmış, el eklemleri sıyrılıp kan içinde kalmış ve dişlerinin arasında çiğnenmiş bir liho dalı duruyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A pair of enforcers with battered faces is escorting Infernus Master Einrich Monteg. His lip is busted, his knuckles are grazed and covered with blood, and there is a chewed-up lho-stick between his teeth.{/n}
